(nation park) locat richland county, south carolina, usa nearest&#160;c eastover, south carolina (town) coordin 33°47′0″n 80°47′0″w﻿ / ﻿33.78333°n 80.78333°w﻿ / 33.78333; -80.78333coordinates: 33°47′0″n 80°47′0″w﻿ / ﻿33.78333°n 80.78333°w﻿ / 33.78333; -80.78333 area 26,546 acr (41.478&#160;sq&#160;mi; 10,743&#160;ha; 107.43&#160;km2) 26,021 acr (40.658&#160;sq&#160;mi; 10,530&#160;ha; 105.30&#160;km2) federal[1] establish novemb 10, 2003 visitor 120,122 (in&#160;2014)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic ramsar wetland design februari 2, 2012 u.s. nation natur landmark design may 1974 congare nation park preserv largest tract old growth bottomland hardwood forest left unit states. locat south carolina, 26,546-acr (41.48&#160;sq&#160;mi; 10,742.79&#160;ha; 107.43&#160;km2) nation park receiv design 2003 culmin grassroot campaign start 1969. lush tree grow floodplain forest tallest eastern u.s., form one highest temper decidu forest canopi remain world. congare river flow park. 57 percent (15,000 acr 61 squar kilometers) park design wilder area. content 1 park histori 2 environ 3 amen attract 4 documentari 5 photo galleri 6 refer 7 extern link park history[edit] cedar creek 1969, sierra club launch grassroot campaign save area old growth forest privat landown interest rel high timber prices. result campaign establish congress congare swamp nation monument octob 18, 1976. nation monument becam intern biospher reserv june 30, 1983. two-third nation monument design wilder area octob 24, 1988, becam import bird area juli 26, 2001. congress redesign monument congare nation park novemb 10, 2003 simultan expand author boundari approxim 4,576 acr (1,852&#160;ha). decemb 31, 2011, approxim 26,021 acr (10,530&#160;ha) park feder ownership.[1] environment[edit] park preserv signific part middl atlant coastal forest ecoregion.[3] design old growth forest. park also one largest concentr champion tree world. amen attractions[edit] addit design wilder area, intern biospher reserve, global import bird area nation natur landmark, congare nation park featur primit campsit offer hiking, canoeing, kayaking, bird watching. bald cypress common tree park. larg anim possibl seen park includ bobcats, deer, feral pigs, feral dogs, coyotes, armadillo turkeys. water contain interest creatur like amphibians, turtles, snakes, alligators, mani type fish, includ bowfin, largemouth bass, panfish, catfish. primit backcountri camp available. hike trail includ bluff trail (0.7&#160;mi), weston lake loop trail (4.6&#160;mi), oakridg trail (7.5&#160;mi), king snake trail (11.1&#160;mi) hiker may spot deer, raccoon, opossum, even bobcat tracks. nation park servic ranger current trail condit found harri hampton visitor’ center. along hike trails, park also 20-mile (32&#160;km) mark cano trail cedar creek. visitor park walk along boardwalk loop, elev 2.4-mile (3.9&#160;km) walkway swampi environ protect delic fungi plant life ground level. congare boast tallest (169&#160;ft, 51.4m) largest (42 cubic meters) loblolli pine (pinu taeda) aliv today. harri hampton visitor center featur exhibit natur histori park, effort protect swamp. also orient film. documentary[edit] 2008, south carolina educ televis (scetv) produc documentari histori congare nation park titl root river: stori congare nation park. documentari featur interview peopl involv movement eventu led area' u.s. nation monument status, observ role park play surround commun lower richland counti area south carolina. program first air scetv network septemb 2009. photo
